ygData.subject: video cards
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question for you all.  I am picking up a GeForce4 TI 4200 64 mb video card and I was wondering how much of a difference that was from a GeForce4 MX440
ygData.messageBody: I have a question for you all.  I am picking up a GeForce4 TI 4200 64 mb video card and I was wondering how much of a difference that was from a GeForce4 MX440 04 mb video card.  Will I see much of a difference?  I was just wondering about that because I remember a while back a discussion about the cards on this board before.  Well I would apperciate any comments on this topic.  according to the manufacturer did say theis card did better than thier 128 mb version of the same card due to the clock speed of the ram.  Just what i have heard.
